title: HeritageDataRCAHMS
description: Royal Commission on Ancient & Historical Monuments of Scotland
creator: http://label.link/item/agent/admin
query: PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> SELECT ?Subject ?prefLabel ?scopeNote WHERE { ?Subject skos:inScheme ?scheme . ?Subject skos:prefLabel ?prefLabel . OPTIONAL { ?Subject skos:scopeNote ?scopeNote . } FILTER(regex(?prefLabel, '$searchword', 'i') || regex(?scopeNote, '$searchword', 'i')) FILTER(?scheme=<http://purl.org/heritagedata/schemes/2> || ?scheme=<http://purl.org/heritagedata/schemes/3> || ?scheme=http://purl.org/heritagedata/schemes/1>) }
